title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 26, 2021
description: Today marks 70 years since the birth of Sally Ride (1951-2012). The first American woman in space, who remembered space as “The most fun I will ever have in my life.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today marks 70 years since the birth of Sally Ride (1951-2012). The first American woman in space, who remembered space as “The most fun I will ever have in my life.”
